description: Sweet roasted butternut squash and carrots work perfectly with cod and sage in this hearty traybake.
name: Cod, Butternut Squash & Carrot Traybake with Sage Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium butternut squash, peeled, deseeded and cubed

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the chopped vegetable in a large roasting tin, drizzle with 3 tablespoons of oil and the fresh thyme and toss to coat. Season with black pepper and roast for 35 minutes, tossing halfway through.
Reduce the heat to 180°C and remove the tray from the oven. Scatter over the pumpkin seeds, sage leaves and honey and stir to coat.

Brush the remaining oil on the cod fillets, season with cracked black pepper and place skin side up on the vegetables. Roast for 12-15 minutes or until the cod is cooked through and the vegetables are golden and crisp.
Divide the vegetables between 4 plates, top with the cod fillets and serve.
